sense.def:
The front of something
je del nečesa, ki je obrnjen k nam ali naprej.

seg.quote: ...jackets with six buttons down the front.
The policeman searched the front of the car.
One of his front teeth was gone.

sense.def:
To do something in front of someone
pomeni nekaj narediti v navzočnosti nekoga.

seg.quote: I couldn't tell you in front of Sam.

sense.def:
V vojni je
the front
kraj, kjer se bojujeta dve vojski.

Kadar nekaj
happens on a particular front
, se zgodi glede na določene okoliščine ali dejavnost.

seg.quote: On the intellectual front, little advance has been made.

sense.def:
To put on a front
pomeni hliniti čustva, ki jih v resnici ne občutimo.

seg.quote: ...presenting a united front to the world.

sense.def:
A front
je tudi črta, kjer se gmota hladnega zraka sreča z gmoto toplega zraka;

Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in front
, je pred drugimi, ki so v isti skupini ali opravljajo enako dejavnost.

seg.quote: Jay walked in front and Simon and Val behind him.
...a lady in the row in front.

sense.def:
To be in front
pomeni zmagovati, na primer na tekmovanju ali natečaju.

seg.quote: After two missed penalty strokes, England were in front.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in front of a particular thing
, je obrnjen k določeni stvari ali blizu prednje strani tistega.

seg.quote: A car was drawing up in front of the house.
There was a man standing in front of me.
